ComicInfo.Title: Revenge of The Decepticons Part 3: Woken Furies
ComicInfo.Summary: Special thanks to Hasbro's Aaron Archer, Michael Kelly, Amie Lozanski, Val Roca, Ed Lane, Michael Provost, Erin Hillman, Jos Huxley, Samantha Lomow, and Michael Verrechia for their invaluable assistance.Revenge of The Decepticons Part 3: Woken Furies: As the Autobots begin to evacuate towards Omega Supreme, they're attacked by anti-robot forces, who are destroyed by the returned Megatron; Megatron swearing vengeance vs. the humans for his having to leave Earth. Meanwhile, Optimus Prime and his group have survived their destroyed aircraft alongside Skywatch forces, swearing to kick butt on their attackers. Starscream attempts to sway Thundercracker back to the Decepticons, but he refuses, and is damaged by him, but saved by Brawn's surprise appearance at his lair as he attacks Starscream.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev36 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-03-22 17:21:12. [Issue ID 806089]
